description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Laid-back and groovy, Tripple is based on the movement of water ripples and color interaction. Players place drops on a variety of liquid fields, creating ripples bearing colored sparkles which interact with each other as they meld. The resulting flashes of light, and their colors, are the goal of this trippy puzzle game.
description.short: Laid-back and groovy, Tripple is based on the movement of water ripples and color interaction. Players place drops on a variety of liquid fields, creating ripples bearing colored sparkles which interact with each other as they meld. The resulting flashes of light, and their colors, are the goal of this trippy puzzle game.
